snippet.title: Cygni: All Guns Blazing - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Cygni is a twin-stick vertical scrolling Shooter hybrid with a cinematic flare, it promises to feature an eye-popping shoot’em up experience, an immersive and orchestrated score and sound design. Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1248080/Cygni_All_Guns_Blazing/
Join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/mt62aE4 

Encamped within the remains of a long-lost civilization on Cygni, the planet’s defense forces are decimated by a surprise attack from a powerful, bio-mechanical, alien race. Players plunge into a sky full of hell in a last-ditch battle for survival. 

Website: https://www.cygnigame.com

Developer: https://www.keelworks.co.uk/

Music composed by Vatche Kalenderian (Kalforian) - https://www.vatchekalenderian.com

#CygniGame   #indiegames   #Keelworks
